full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
### ENG
#### 5P423-220159 - Highway Tractor
#### Date: 2022-11-17

### FRA
#### 5P423-220159 - Tracteur Routier
#### Date: 2022-11-17

## Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3733873958
* **Amendment Number:** 8
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3733873958
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-17
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-20T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-01-10
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-03-31
* **Tender Status:** [EXPIRED][1]
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta, Canada

## Background

Parks Canada Agency has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) highway tractor to Jasper, Alberta. The tractor will be used for daily transport of a 52 ft tandem axle walking floor refuse trailer on a 100km stretch of main highway to a land fill. The vehicle will also transport the load through unimproved road to the dumping location.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Ruwani Wall (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

[1]: Depending on the context, tender status might vary, e.g., "Active", "Closed", etc. 

Note:
See the attachment for bidding details.
